data.title: In-Line PTFE Gas Filters
data.meta_description: Our gas filters provide superior particulate filtration to minimize pressure drop and to maximize filter lifetime. Choose from Wafergard® and Linegard™ in-line gas filters.
data.text:
Cleanroom Air Filters

Cleanroom filtration utilizes unique chemistry to remove critical contaminants at a lower pressure drop. VaporSorb™ cleanroom chemical filters deliver greater than 95% removal efficiency. Implementation is easy in front/rear access frame banks, side access housing units or ceiling fan units.

Caerus™ Coating Technology

Caerus™ family of ALD coatings are deposited at low temperatures with superior film quality. Our Caerus coatings are highly conformal, dense, pinhole-free and exhibit homogeneous microstructure. The coatings have excellent adhesion and provide outstanding corrosion and etch resistance properties. They are also characterized by superb electrical voltage stand-off and exceptional trace metal diffusion barrier layer characteristics.

Pegasus™ Coating Technology

Pegasus™ series coatings are a family of precision-engineered PVD coatings tailored for Fluorine and Chlorine plasma etch applications. Our Pegasus coatings are deposited at low temperatures and can be deposited on aluminum, alumina, stainless steel and other commonly used substrate materials, with superior adhesion. These coatings provide etch resistance, low particle generation, and oxidation resistance.

Surface Mount Gas Filters

Available with stainless steel or nickel filter elements, Wafergard® gas filters provide ultimate process protection, superior corrosion-resistance, and excellent compatibility with inert, hydride, and reactive gases. The surface-mount design consumes less space on gas panels and reduces parts inventories and variations.

Graphite Grades

We offer a wide range of graphite materials as well as post processing and machining capabilities to meet the demanding requirements of semiconductor processes. You can choose the right graphite for your application by grain size (one, five and ten micron) and all grades are sold in bulk form or as a custom machined components for specific applications.

Premium Graphite Components

Our graphite is tightly controlled to produce materials that have a uniform microstructure and the right balance of strength, grain size and hardness to offer optimum performance for your intended applications.
